summary: Anteoculatia Type: Hex Pronunciation: AN-tea-oh-cuh-LAY-chee-a Description: Anteoculatia is a hex which turns a person's hair...
body:
Anteoculatia

Type: Hex

Pronunciation: AN-tea-oh-cuh-LAY-chee-a

Description: Anteoculatia is a hex which turns a person’s hair into antlers.

Seen/Mentioned: This spell was used to make Pansy Parkinson grow antlers in 1996. 

If you tell me that this spell wasn’t James Potters’ go-to hex during his time at Hogwarts…you’re lying.

tags: sorry if this part is so short
title: A new home (part 9)
body:
Please find the previous part here :  I II III IV V VI VII VIII

“Having trouble sleeping?” Harry asked as he found his best friend playing wizarding chess at 2 am in the empty common room.

“Can’t sleep. You? Nightmares again?

-Again.

-Wanna play?

-I dunno, I

-Just sit. I’ll play for you.”

Harry grinned slightly before curling himself in the sofa, accio-ing a plaid. The warmth and roaring blaze of the fire was comforting, extracting him from the numbness of the woods. Being with Ron had always helped him feel better. The Weasley had always made him feel safe; at home.

“You know, I’ve been thinking about what Dean told us tonight.

-The mural?

-Hope.

-Oh.

-Do you think that’s why Ginny hasn’t come back yet? Because she’d lost hope in her future here?

-You think she has?

-She said she’ll be back for school. Mom said she’s send a postcard on the 4th, to tell us not to worry. But how can I not? She’s my baby sis…”

thank you for reading! This way for part 10 :)

@abstractundefined  - Ask if you wanna be my lover  tagged :)

summary:
⚡️A power so dark, that only a few dare to speak of it ⚡️
https://www.wattpad.com/story/168608519-light-dark 
Follow the story...
body:
⚡️A power so dark, that only a few dare to speak of it ⚡️



https://www.wattpad.com/story/168608519-light-dark

• Light & Dark •


Follow the story of Mirabel Davina Grindelwald, the niece of Gellert grindelwald as she faces challenges that await her.

This is a story of magic, secrets, betrayals and family. It’s about friendship, and love and battling our own demons so we can face the monsters around us.

I am writing a Theseus Scamander book for those of you who have fallen in love with this amazing and handsome character.

Story is on Wattpad (username- princess1284).

!!!WARNING!!!

This book will contain spoilers for those of you who haven’t seen the movie yet.

I really hope that you will enjoy this book !!!!!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: Everything about wizarding world, it's politics, education system, history and everything in general is so complex that I...
body:
Everything about wizarding world, it’s politics, education system, history and everything in general is so complex that I sometimes forget it’s all made up.

Like yeah of course I’m a wizard… Wait.

me: ughhh i miss my home
my friend: aww you're homesick, do       you miss your mom?? When is the last time you talked to...
body:
me: ughhh i miss my home

my friend: aww you’re homesick, do you miss your mom?? When is the last time you talked to her??

me: what?!? No I meant Hogwarts. I haven’t seen it for such a long time

my friend: so that’s how I lost a friend

summary: im still so confused as to WHY the hell Harry decided to name his second son Albus SEVERUS Potter. why not name him after...
body:
im still so confused as to WHY the hell Harry decided to name his second son Albus SEVERUS Potter. why not name him after Neville? Fred? George? Ron? Dean? Seamus? Lupin? Draco? Regulus? anyone but snape? Harry, snape doesn’t deserve the title ‘the bravest man i knew’. just because he turned his back on Voldemort doesn’t mean he’s brave! here are some points of the worst things he did in his life.

  • literally bullied Harry and his friends, knowing that Harry has no power against him.
  • he ruined hogwarts.
  • called Harry’s mum a slur.
  • stepped over your father’s dead body to hug the 'love of his life’.
  • wanted to become a death eater in his FIFTH year (if that doesn’t say something about him).
  • killed Dumbledore and is not sorry about it.
  • brought death eaters into the school ground.
  • took at least 50 points a day from Gryffindor just because Harry breathes.
  • played favourites.
  • took revenge on innocent Harry just because Harry’s father was a dickhead at school.
  • is Neville’s biggest fear.
  • got mad at Harry for taKING NOTES in Harry’s first year.
  • insulted Hermione’s buck teeth which grew bigger because a bully jinxed it.
  • bullied Neville and almost killed Neville’s toad if Hermione hadn’t saved Neville’s potion.
  • is a dickhead
  • clinging to his lost love
  • his whole life

bravest man i knew my ass, Harry. you could’ve named your child Albus Neville Potter and it would’ve sounded good and your friend would be honored but you decided to name your cute child a filthy man’s name.

sorry not mcfucking sorry

summary: In the Harry Potter Universe children with magic sometimes cause 'accidental magic' when emotional. So now imagine a Yautja with...
question: In the Harry Potter Universe children with magic sometimes cause 'accidental magic' when emotional. So now imagine a Yautja with their human s/o getting a child, it looks like a Yautja, it acts like one, but it got the magic genes and now whenever it gets excited, angry, wants something, etc. Something happens, like dads armor and weapons turning rainbow coloured, toys flying around the room, they somehow got into the cupboard and ate all the cookies even though it is locked. Stuff like that
answer:
Omg XD

- ABSOLUTE CHAOS. Imagine a Predator seeing that his armor turned rainbow color. He won’t be happy at all.

- Also being hit by a flying wooden toy is no fun. I speak from experience here

- Pred Dad isn’t too happy about it all since he worries that the kid hurts itself

- Because the kid is a Yautja He has a difficult time at hogwards and as such Yautja dad is allowed to visit him once every week to check up on him and provide him with all Necessary items. Such as raw meat

- Yautja Kid is quite mighty and his favorite teacher is Prof. Snape.

- Snape is neutral towards yautja kid.

- Yautja kids favorite class is defense against the dark arts

Hope you enjoyed ^^ i didnt assign the kid a Hogwards house since i dont know where it would fit

blog.name: 12dancingwizards
blog.title: Sirius Black Is Gay
blog.description:
Jk Rowling who? Idk her.

All the characters are now queer poc and anyone who disagrees can fight me. I’m here for positivity about all the houses and running Snape over with my truck. Asks, messages, and submissions are super welcome!! I wanna interact with my followers!

Mod is a lesbian nonbinary slytherin if you were wondering. They/them pronouns please!

Also this is a sideblog. Main is @glitch-h Icon credit: @alessiajontrunfio

tags: wish i had a mom like her
summary: I’m really crying over everything tonight like ... Molly Weasley. Who saw an orphaned child who hadn’t known love for most of...
body:
I’m really crying over everything tonight like … Molly Weasley. Who saw an orphaned child who hadn’t known love for most of his life, a famous child who everyone else gawked over immediately, but rather than ogling him, she essentially adopted him. She had a gaggle of children and very little money and yet she saw Harry and thought “well guess I have a new son” and made sure that he had presents on Christmas and a place to go when and if he needed it. She opened her arms and accepted him into her family and god she was so good. She was exactly what Harry needed… a mom.

Molly Weasley who fought in both wizarding wars and killed a death eater and fought to protect her children and make a better world for them. But also held out a gentle hand and made sure that even in the middle of a war, Love was never lost.

Oh god I love Molly Weasley
